snippet: Dmitri A. Medvedev’s transition from president to prime minister met more opposition than expected in Parliament, though it ultimately passed.
abstract: Russian Parliament, amid some dissent, confirms former Pres Dmitri A Medvedev as prime minister, completing a long-planned transition; one-third of Russia's parliament votes against Medvedev's accession, signaling his weakened political status.
lead_paragraph: Dmitri A. Medvedev’s transition from president to prime minister met more opposition than expected in Parliament, though it ultimately passed.

headline.seo: Slight Hiccup as Putin and Medvedev Switch Jobs in Russia
headline.main: With Some Dissent, Russia’s Parliament Confirms Medvedev
headline.print_headline: With Some Dissent, Russia’s Parliament Confirms Medvedev
